title: State Level Capacity Building Workshop on Career Handbooks & My Career Adviser App buatsaih
content:
4465/2025-2026

Aizawl, 13th February, 2026 :Vawiin khan SCERT, Mizoram, Samagra Shiksha, Mizoram, NCERTlehPandit Sunderlal Sharmna Central Institute of Vocational Education (PSSCIVE), Bhopal-te tangkawpin an huaihawt "State Level Capacity Building Workshop on Career Handbooks & My Career Adviser App" chu hman a ni.

He nileng awh workshop-ah hian DEO leh SDEO te, DIET Principal-te lehDIET lecturer-te an tel a. He programme hawnna inkhawm hi Pi Caroline Zoramthangi, Director, SCERT chuan kaihruaiin, Pu David Lalthantluanga, IAS, Secretary, School Education Department chu khuallian a ni.

He programme hawnna inkhawmah hian Dr. Lalduhawmi Thomte, Joint Director, SCERT chuan Career Guidance chungchanga SCERT hmalak tawhna te report in, he programme in a tumte a sawifiah.

Dr. Lalduhawmi Thomte chuan zirlaiten nakin lawka eizawnna an neih theihna tur atana career awareness campaignte, career exhibitionte, career counsellingte an lo neih thin thu a sawi a. NEP 2020 in naupangten eizawnna kawng an zawh tanna tur atan leh textbook pawn lama thiamna an zirtheihna tura ruahmanna "10 Bagless Days" chu hlawhtling taka hman mek niin, chumi atana hman tur chuan India rama a hmasa ber ni turin "Nunkawng Sialna Bu" SCERT, Mizoram siam chu August 2024 atanga hman tan a nih thu a sawi. Hetiang guideline hi PSSCIVE, Bhopal-in a tihchhuah ve tak hnuin, Nunkawng Sialna Bu chu SCERT chuan ennawn lehin, June 2025 khan revised and enlarged edition a tichhuak leh a ni a ti. Tuna zirlai ni mekte hi nakin lawka eizawnna tling tur hnathawk thei tura buatsaih lawk hi a pawimawhzia thu a sawi bawk.

Pu David Lalthantluanga, IAS, Secretary, School Education Department chuan 500 Career Cards leh zirlaite hna zawnna atana pui theitu tur Mobile App chhawpchhuah a ni chu lawmawm a tih thu sawiin, an hun laite ngaihtuahin tun lai zirlaite chu an vanneih tawh zia thu a sawi.

He workshop hi Dr. Vinay Swarup Mehrotra, Professor, PSSCIVE, Bhopal- in a rawn hmanpui a, a hawnna inkhawmah hian NCERT leh PSSCIVE in career guidance atana 500 Career Cards leh My Career Adviser App an siam chhan leh tangkai taka hmang tur chuan zirlaite leh zirtirtute mai bakah an nu leh paten a hman dan leh a nihna chiang taka an hriatve a pawimawihzia thu a sawi.

Pu C. Lalthanzira, SPD, Samagra Shiksha, Mizoram pawhin he hawnna inkhawmah hian thu tawi a sawi bawk.

Pu Vanlalrosiama, MF&AS, Addl. SPD, Samagra Shiksha chuan kalkhawmte hnenah lawmthu sawiin he inkhawm hi khar a ni.

title: “I Kawtkaiah Sawrkar” Programme Held at Buarpui Village under Bunghmun Block
content:
512/2025-2026

Lunglei, 13 February 2026:The “I Kawtkaiah Sawrkar” (Prashasan Gaon Ki Ore) programme, an initiative of the Deputy Commissioner, Lunglei, was conducted today at Power & Electricity Mual, Buarpui, under Bunghmun RD Block for the residents of Buarpui and nearby villages.

The programme was chaired by Bunghmun BDO Pu Paul Rokima, who highlighted the objectives of the initiative. Lunglei Sub-Deputy Commissioner Pu H. Lalthlengliana presented a report on the implementation of the programme, and representatives of various departments briefed attendees on the services provided. Buarpui Village Council President Pu Zakhuma expressed gratitude to the departments and offices for bringing services directly to the people.

Departments including the Deputy Commissioner’s Office, Block Development Office, Health & Family Welfare, AH & Veterinary, Women & Child Development (ICDS), Agriculture, Horticulture, Public Health Engineering, Land Revenue & Settlement Department, and Mizoram Rural Bank set up stalls to provide services. These included issuance and correction of important documents (Aadhaar, ST/Residential/Income Certificates, Job Cards, Land Passes), opening of bank accounts, medical and veterinary consultations and vaccinations, awareness on government schemes, and on-the-spot registrations.

Altogether, around 450 people availed various services during the programme.

title: KOLASIB BAWRHSAP HOVIN BILKHAWTHLIR CHEMPHAI-AH 'HAWITE KUT' ROPUI TAKA HMAN A NI
content:
4463/2025-2026

Bilkhawthlir, the 13th February 2025:India ramin ei tur hriak (edible oil) a intodelh theih nana hmalakna kal zelah, vawiin khan Kolasib District Agriculture Department bultumin Bilkhawthlir Chemphai-ah 'Hawite Kut' leh thlai hriak leh be chi chin uar beihpui thlakna hun hman a ni a. He hun hi Kolasib Bawrhsap Pu Robert C Lalhmangaiha chuan Khuallian niin a hmanpui.

Khuallian Pu Robert C Lalhmangaiha, DC Kolasib chuan Hawite chin dan ziahna bu (pamphlet) chu a duh apiangte chhiar theih turin a tlangzarh nghal a. Kalkhawmte hnenah thu sawiin, District Agriculture Office chuan loneituten hlawk zawka hna an thawh theih nan leh hma an sawn zel theih nan hma an la reng a ni, a ti.

Bawrhsap chuan, "India ram chu kum 2047-ah chuan thlai hriak leh be lam chia intodelh turin hma a la chho mek a. Hawite hriak hi hriselna atan a tha em em a, chuvangin kuthnathawktute pawhin kan chin uar deuh deuh a pawimawh a ni," a ti a. Loneitute chu beidawng lova taima taka hma la tur leh, Department hotute nen tangkawpa hlawhtlinna chang ngei tura fuihin, Hawite hmun chu mipui tlawh theih turin a hawng nghal bawk a ni.

He hun hi Pu Joseph Lalnuntluanga, DAO Kolasib chuan kaihruaiin, Bilkhawthlir Chemphai-a Hawite chin beihpui thlak hi 'Thingdelh FIG' te hmalakna a nih thu a sawi a. Chemphai leilet chu buh chin loh lai (off-season) a awl mai mai loh nan leh loneitute tan sum lakluhna hnar dang a nih theih nan hman tangkai a nih thu a sawi. Pu Joseph-a chuan, "He Hawite Kut hi Mizoram-a Agriculture hmanga tourism (Agri-Tourism) tihhmasawnna atana rahbi pawimawh tak leh bultanna a ni," a ti bawk.

Vawiina hawn tak 'Hawite Kut' pual hian a hmunah stall eng emaw zat siam a ni a, sangha man thar lei tur chhawpchhuah niin, tlawhtu a duh apiang tan a hmun hi tlawh theih a ni ang. Hemi bakah hian khualzin, riak duh te tan man chawi a riahna buk (accommodation) buatsaih a ni bawk.

title: nternational Condom Day 2026 hmang
content:
4458/2025-2026

Aizawl, 13th February, 2026 :February ni 13 hi International Condom Day a ni a, hehe ni denchhen hian Mizoram State AIDS Control Society (MSACS) leh AIDS Healthcare Foundation (AHF) India Cares te buatsaihin Dawrpui Multi-Purpose Hall, Aizawl ah hun hman a ni. Kumin International Condom Day thupui atan hian ‘Just Use It’ tih hman a ni.

International Condom Day, 2026 puala hun hmanna hi Pi Zuiliani Hrahsel, Joint Director (IEC) MSACS-in a kaihruai a, Pi Lalrinpuii, Minister, Health & Family Welfare Department, Government of Mizoram chu khuallian niin hun a hmanpui a ni.

Khuallian, Pi Lalrinpuii, Health Minister chuan Mizoram ah sex atanga HIV kai kan pung zel chu a ngaimawh thu leh hnam ang pawha mualphona a nih thu a sawi a, World Health Organization (WHO) pawhin Condom chu HIV leh sex atanga inkaichhawn theih natna darh zel tur venna awlsam leh tangkai ber pakhat a nih thu an tarlan angin, kan ramah pawh Condom chungchanga kan ngaihdan leh rinthu diklo kan neih thinte kan paihbo a, a hman dan tur leh a nihna ang taka Condom hi hman a nih chuan HIV leh sex atanga inkaichhawn theih natna tam tak darh tur nasa taka kan ven theih a beisei tlat thu a sawi a ni.

India ram HIV prevalence rate hi 0.2 ani a, mahse Mizoram HIV prevalence rate hi 2.74 a ni hi a zahthlak a ni. Theihtawp kan chhuah a ngaih thu uar takin a sawi.

Mizoramah mahni kawppuite laka rinawm lo an tam chu pawi a tih thu leh kan rinna nen pawh a inhmeh loh thu a sawi bawk a, hei hi HIV kan rama darh zel nachhan lian tak pakhat a nih thu sawiin kawppui lakah rinawm turin Zoram mipuite a chah. Chutih rualin thalaite nupui pasal neih hma a sex hmang lo tur leh a thei ngang lote chu condom hmang hreh lo turin a chah zui bawk.

HIV kaina tam ber chu sex atang a nih thu sawiin, za a sawmsarih (70%) lai a nih thu a tarlang a, Mizoram future veng tur hian kan thalaitean pawimawh hle tih uar takin a sawi. Sex atanga HIV/AIDS a darh zel loh nan leh kan lo hrisel zel theih nan “Just use it” tih hi hre reng turin International Condom Day a kalkhawmte a chah a ni.

International Condom Day hmannaah hian khuallian, Pi Lalrinpuii, Health Minister chuan Love Brigade 2.0 Campaign hawnna hun a hmang a, Love Brigade 2.0 Campaign hnuaiah hian Two-Wheeler Taxi khalhtute hnenah Condom pai theihna tur Love Brigade Condom Jacket sem a ni. Condom Jacket chu passenger leh a mamawh apiang ten Condom-an lak theihna atana tangkai taka hmang turin a chah a ni.

International Condom Day, 2026 hmannaah hian Dr. V. Sam Prasad, Country Program Director, AHF India Cares chuan Love Brigade 2.0 Campaign kalpui dan chungchang sawina hun a hmang a, HIV leh sex atanga inkaichhawn theih natna hi invenna ngaihthahna apiangah a hluar thin thu sawiin, Sex atanga HIV darh zel tur venna atan Condom chungchanga kan ngaihdan dik lote dah bo a, a mamawh apiang ten awlsam taka Condom an neih theih dan tur ruahmanna siam leh Condom tel lova sex hman loh kan ngaihpawimawh a tul thu a sawi.

International Condom Day, 2026 pual hian February ni 12, 2026 khan Two-Wheeler Taxi hmangtu mipuiten awlsam zawka Condom an lak theihna turinTwo-Wheeler Taxi khalhtute hnenah Condom pai theihna tur Love Brigade Condom Jacket sem a ni a, Condom Jacket semchhuahna hun hi Aizawl Two-Wheeler Taxi Association (ATTA) hruaituten an hmanpui bawk a ni.

Aizawl, 13 February 2026:The Chief Minister of Mizoram, Lalduhoma, today chaired a review meeting at the Chief Minister’s Conference Hall with officials working under the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways to assess the progress of National Highway projects in the state.

The Chief Minister expressed appreciation to Union Road Transport and Highways Minister Nitin Gadkari for his continued support to Mizoram, noting that several state proposals have received positive consideration. He also highlighted ongoing discussions on adopting rigid pavement technology suited to Mizoram’s high rainfall conditions.

Officials reviewed the status of major highway projects being implemented by National Highways and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited and the state Public Works Department, including ongoing works, completed stretches, and challenges faced during execution. The meeting also revisited decisions from the previous review held in September last year.

Updates were also shared on highway improvement works across multiple districts and on proposals awaiting central approval.

The meeting was attended by PWD Minister Pu Vanlalhlana, EF&CC Minister Pu Lalthansanga, Revenue Minister Pu B. Lalchhanzova, senior officials of the state government, and representatives of highway authorities.

title: CHIEF MINISTER-IN NATIONAL HIGHWAY LAIH MEKTE REVIEW MEETING NEI
content:
4454/2025-2026

Aizawl the 13th February 2026:Vawiin khan Chief Minister Conference Hall-ah Chief Minister Pu Lalduhoma hovin Ministry of Road Transport & Highways hnuaia Mizorama hnathawh mekte enhona (review meeting) neih a ni.

Chief Minister chuan, Minister of Road Transport & Highways Pu Nitin Gadkari hi kan tan a tha em em a, kan dil apiang min tihsak deuh zel thin. Kan hriat angin Vairengte - Aizawl 4 lane-ah pawh entity pahnih hnen zangnadawmna pek min phalsak hial a, hetiang hi hmun dangah a la thleng ngai lo hial ang. A chungah hian kan lawm hle a ni. Ruahtui dawng tam ram kan nih vanga kan kawngpuite rigid pavement tawh zawk tura kan dilna pawh uluk taka an zirchian mek thu min rawn hrilh a ni, a ti.

Meetingah hian Ministry of Road Transport & Highways hnuaia Mizorama hnathawk mekte leh an hnathawhna lama harsatna an tawh hrang hrangte an sawiho a. Nikum September thlaa Chief Minister-in Review Meeting a lo neihpui tawha an thu dah bawhzuina an enho bawk.

MoRTH hnuaiah hian NHIDCL leh PWD ten hna an thawk mek a. NHIDCL project thawh mekte chu:

1. Lunglei - Chhumkhum, 37.42 kms2. Chhumkhum - Tlabung, 37.53 kms3. Pawlrang - Rulchawm section of Tuivai - Keipang, 30.41 kms4. Zorinpui - Longmasu, 28.24 kms5. Vairengte - Sairang (Package 3 atanga package 8 thleng), 90.11 kms6. Aizawl bypass pkg 2, 4.6 kms7. Aizawl bypass pkg 3, 19.3 kms

an ni a. Thawh tan mai tur Aizawl bypass package 1, kilometer 11 a thui a awm a. Project thawh zawh tawh (completed projects) 20 an nei.

Heng an hnathawh meka harsatna an tawhte chipchiar takin an sawi a, a bawhzui dan tur an sawi zel a. National Highway No 2, Aizawl - Tuipang kawng thawh zawh tawha harsatna la awmte pawh sawiin Chief Minister chuan, tuna Arbitrator-a case lut mekte dinhmun hi meeting neih leh hunah chuan kimchang taka report pek theih tawh tur a ni a. Thingfal khuaa kawng laihin a nghawng Biak in, School leh mimal in chhiate umzuina tharlam ber pawh kan hre thei tawh tur a ni, a ti.

Mizoram PWD enkawlte chu:

1. NH 154/6 Assam border - Bilkhawthlir2. NH 54/6 Sairang - Zemabawk3. NH 6 Zokhawthar - Champhai4. NH 150/2 Tuivai - Seling5. NH 44A/108 Langkaih - Sairang6. NH 6 (Spur) Bairabi - Mamit7. NH 306A Vairengte - New Vervek8. NH 502A Lawngtlai - R. Zocha9. NH 502 Zero Point - Siaha

te an ni a. Heng an hmalakna hrang hranga thil pawimawhte hi chipchiar takin an sawi a. Sorkar laipuia thlen tur thil pawimawhte an ngaihtuahho bawk.

PWD hian National Highway siamthat hna hmun eng emaw zatah an thawk mek a. Darlak leh Tuidam inkar kawng chu chak zawka bawhzui tura tih a ni.

Chief Minister-in Aizawl Thenzawl Lunglei kawngpui National Highway-a puang tura sorkar laipui a dilna chu Union Home Ministry chuan Aizawl leh Thenzawl chin a rawn pawmpui (recommend) tawh a. MoRTH ngaihchan mek a ni.

PWD Minister kaihhruaina hnuaiah Aizawl khawpui chhung kawngpui siamthat hna a kal mek a. Tun hnai khan district capital 11 kawngpui siamthatna tur sum belh leh an ni.

Hlimena Transport Department ram chu Vehicle Scrapping Centre dah theih tura peih thawkhat a ni tawh a. Vehicle Scrapping kalpui chak hi SASCI atanga lawmman dawn theihna a nih avangin ngaihpawimawh bika neih ni se, an ti.

Meeting-ah hian Pu Vanlalhlana, PWD Minister, Pu Lalthansanga, EF & CC Minister, Pu B. Lalchhanzova, Revenue Minister, PWD officials te, Mizoram sokar official pawhmawhte leh NHIDCL Mizoram Regional Office Executive Director thar Pu Adelbert Susngi te an tel a. Aizawl DC leh Kolasib CALA te a hmunah an tel a, Deputy Commissioner dangten online-in an zawm bawk.

title: Zawlnuamah Co-operation Minister-in North East-a hmasa ber ni turin Sangha tin siamna hawng
content:
4453/2025-2026

Dated : Mamit the 13th of February, 2026 :Vawiin khan Pu PC Vanlalruata, Hon'ble Minister Cooperation, Agriculture, Irrigation & Water Resources chuan Zawlnuam khuaah Sangha tin siamna Khual lian niin a hawng a, Pu Robert Romawia, Bialtu MLA Khual zahawm niin a telpui bawk.

Khual lian chuan Mizoram tana mellung thar, rotling tak mai hawn an ni ta chu a buatsaihtu Society leh Department-te thawhrimna leh hmalakna a fakawm hle a ni a ti a. Sangha tin siamna kan kawtkaia hawn a ni ta chu sangha tharchhuah kan hralh lehna kawngah nasa takin kuthnathawktute a pui dawn a, sangha kan manin a lian chiah hralh a nuamin, a man pawh a pangaiin a hralh theih thin a, tunah chuan a te deuh zawk pawh Sangha tinah siam theih a ni dawn ta hi a tha hle a, chutihrual chuan ei leh in siamtu kan nih avangin fimkhur tak leh mipuite'n an duh tur ngeia siamchhuak tura kan inbuatsaih a tul dawn a, Industry hlawhtlinna ber chu min dawrtu mipuite mit kan tlung em,an duhzawng kan siamchhuak em tih ngaihtuahna chang hria a piangin hmasawnna hmel an hmuh thin avangin chutiang ang taka inbuatsaih tur chuan Zawlnuam Fishery Cooperation Society- te a chah a, Sangha tin siamna hmunhma leh hmalak leh zelna turah sawrkarin theihtawpchhuah a in huam thu leh inpawh tlang taka thawkho zel turin a sawm bawk.

Agriculture Minister hian kuthnathawktute thlavang chu Mizoram Sawrkar chuan a hauhna hle a, a bikin khawthlang mipuite tan kuhva sawngbawlna tur Zamuang khuaah buatsaih mek a ni a, Oil Palm chu Mamit District nasa zawka chin tum a, hmalak mek a ni a. Mamit District chu Agriculture bikah Aspirational District atana thlan kan nih avangin hmasawnna tura project hrang hrangte kuthnathawktute nena thawkho chungin siam chhoh a ni dawn a, kuthnathawktute hmasawnna atana an mamawh ber an thlai thar hralhchhuah lehna chu Sawrkarin a ngaihpawimawh ber a nih avangin sawhthing leina kawngah ruahmanna fel fai tak siama a lei mek te hi hmasawnna lawmawm tak a ni a ti bawk.

Pu Robert Romawia Bialtu MLA pawhin thil la awm ngailo, Hachhek bialin kan nei ta leh hawn theih a ni ta chu bial aiawhin lawmthu a sawi a, Zawlnuam Fishery Cooperation Society. Ltd hnuaia Sangha dil nei zawng zawngte pawh hmasawnna nasa zawk nei a, tam zawk leh hlawk zawka thar tura inbuatsaih turin a chah bawk.

Pu Lalthangfala, ARCS chuan technical report pein Zawlnuam Fishery Cooperation Society Ltd. hnuaia Sangha tin siamna khawl hi kum 2024 July thla khan Cooperative Department chuan Sawrkar laipui hnenah thlen sakin, Integrated Cooperative Development Project kaltlangin Rs 65 lakhs hmuh a ni a, khawl lei nan Rs 40 lakhs hman niin, a in sak nan 25 hman a ni. Sangha tin hi vawikhatah kg 50 siam theih niin chu chu a tin chuan tin 120 a niin hemi siam chhuak tur hian darkar 2 chhung hun hman a ngai a ni.

title: KOLASIB-AH ROAD SAFETY MONTH HMAN TAN A NI; KOLASIB SP PU LALRINPUIA VARTE-IN A HAWNG
content:
4452/2025-2026

Kolasib, the 13th February 2026:Vawiin khan DC Conference Hall, Kolasib-ah District Safety Commitee buatsaihin ‘Road Safety Month’ hawnna inkhawm buatsaih a ni a. Pu Lalrinpuia Varte, SP Kolasib in road safety month hi a hawng a ni.

Pu Lalrinpuia Varte, SP Kolasib chuan kalkhawmte lawmthu hrilhin, road safety chu mitin ngaih pawimawh tur a ni, a ti a. Road safety chu motor khalhtute chauh ni lovin, ke a kal mipui (pedestrians) te pawhin kan ngaih pawimawh a tul thu a sawi. SP chuan tunlaiin thalai leh kawng kal thenkhatin mobile phone khawih paha kawng kan kan ching thin chu thil pawi thei leh hlauhawm tak a nih thu sawiin, fimkhur lehzual turin chah a. Road safety in a tum - chetsualna thleng thin tihtlem kawngah sorkar leh mipuite tanrual a, theihtawp kan chhuah tlan a pawimawh a ni, a ti.

Motor khalhtute pawh fimkhur taka lirthei khalh turin a chah a, chak lutuk (over speeding) a tlan lova, a hun leh hmun a zira speed control thiam a tul thu a sawi bawk. SP chuan, "Traffic rule leh dan te hi min phuarrittu ni lovin, kan himna atana duan a ni tih hriain, kan zavaiin thuawih takin zawm theuh ila, chhiatna thleng thin tam tak kan pumpelh thei a ni," a ti.

He hun hi Pu Jerome Lalbiakdika, District Transport Officer, Kolasib chuan a kaihruai a. Programme khar nan Kolasib Bawrhsap Pu Robert C. Lalhmangaiha chuan lawmthu sawina hun a hmang a. Bawrhsap chuan District chhung a road safety kawnga hma latu department hrang hrang leh tlawmngai pawl te inpeknaah lawmthu a sawi a. Road safety chungchang inzirtirna (awareness) chu a tam thei ang bera inhrilh darh a tul thu sawiin, mipuite himna turin thawhhona tha tak nen hma la chhunzawm zel turin kalkhawmte a sawm bawk a ni.

Vawiin hun hmanna ah hian Kolasib District chhunga Head of Office te, Driver Association leh Owner Association hruaitute an tel a ni.

title: Serchhip Districta lirthei registration thi tawhte tinung turin hriattir
content:
4451/2025-2026

Dated Serchhip, the 13th February, 2026:Rules No.52 of The Central Motor Vehicle Rules, 1989- in a sawi angin Vehicle Registration Certificate hi kum 15 a tlin hma ni 60 chhunga renew thin tur a ni a. Registration Certificate thi tawhte chu khalh chhuah phal a nih loh thu District Transport Officer Pu Vanlaldika chuan hriattirna a chhuah.

Serchhip District chhunga motor, kum 15 tling tawh, Registration thi tawh zawng zawngte he lehkha tihchhuah (12th February, 2026) atanga thla thum chhungin registration renew vek tura hriattir kan ni a. He hun tiam chhunga renew lote chu Director of Transport, Mizoram, Circular (vide.No.D.26015/2/2023-DTE (TRP-IT Dt. 05.02.2026) angin BLACKLIST / NOT TO BE TRANSACTED-ah dah vek an ni ang.
